outputs.output_descr: Enhance equitable livelihood opportunities and food security with a focus on vulnerable groups. Strengthened analysis and decision support capacity of the three departs of CBK with the following specific output (a) Strategy plans, (b) all staff of the three departments trained in adapted models, tools, systems etc for economic analysis and decision guidance (c) accurate macro economic forecast and analysis (d) improved signalling component of government securities (e) an agreed three year staff training and development plan/program.

project_descr: CBK Policy Research and Analysis Support Project
